channel.title: Options for items Pi
channel.description: how do i give the options where players can craft all items then click on it at once and herblore also i would like to change to where people can type in the numbers of item they want to buy from a shop

item.title: Options for items Pi
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

starbeast199:

how would i add it?

You need a slight understanding of the packet system.
You are going to need different interfaces, depening on the number of items craftable (knife -> logs can make short, long, shafts).
There are plenty of lists that tell you the interface ID’s, the trick if finding the one you need. Most of them have the options you want for right click already. It is just up to you to send the correct item ID to the correct “interface” to make it appear like the above image shows. I am sure there are tools that exist to help find what you are looking for.

Read full topic

item.title: Options for items Pi
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

For the first part, something like that?

And for the second part,

p.getOutStream().createFrame(27); p.flushOutStream();

That creates this

in the Player class you would create a boolean to track whether or not the player is shopping (if their isn’t one already)

and in the class BankX2, you would read the amount from the frame 27, (Xamount), and apply it to the buying from the shop.

Read full topic
